about_the_game:
Welcome everyone to follow our Steam gaming community

4K HD game + 5.6G extra free Hpatch! Aren't you excited!!

Our gameplay is simple! Funny and cute! ~HHHHHHHHHA~ ha ~

I sincerely hope that my works can bring you happiness

Hope you are willing to support our legitimate game! Give us the power to update it!

Hpatch: Search for HAPPY BOOM PATCH on the Steam store or follow YOUTUBE，DISCORD ，ITCH to get more info

Game features

First of all!You have to roll dice to move your character, and of course your dice can change through vehicle upgrades

There are many types of dice in the game: 4,6,8,10,12, 20-sided dice

The game currently has 11 selectable characters (7 main characters, 3 sealed characters, 1 hidden character),

And 6 NPCS who work hard for you, a total of 17 dynamic characters

There is a difference between basic properties and business in the game, and you can increase your zone level by stars to get more income

Properties: Income is stable

Business: The Income is not stable, but you can still earn gold while your opponent is resting!

The more properties or businesses you own in the same area, the more Income you get!

When you have more money, you can consider fighting for the Gold Area! It has seven different types of buildings waiting to be remodeled

Supermarket: Make MORE Money!

Scenery: There is a probability of triggering lightning!

Temple: Regular shelter

Research Institute: Send you some strange props regularly

Casino: Making or losing money depends on luck!

Cinema: Give your opponents a break!

At the same time, the Gold Area can also be voted by everyone, when the vote is full, the Gold Area will be forcibly removed!

Owners of the gold zone can vote less when they return to the Golden Zone(Gold Area)!

There are more than 30 items waiting to be obtained

Proper planning and use of items in the game is the key to quick success

There are more than 30 different random events in the game, which are often accompanied by: Sadness! Happy! Madness!

There are also situations that can trigger random events:

If you enter a monastery, the nuns can say some magic prayers for you for free!

If you enter the Magic House, the magic spells of the mystic sorcerer are not free!

Pretty Girl Club! As a gentleman, you must be very familiar with it!

There's a lucky star celebrity election every 10 days!

If the beautiful girl you help becomes the lucky female star! Then you will get a big bonus !

There are 20 beautiful girls in the game waiting for everyone to help ! (There are still 10 hidden girls waiting for everyone to find in FREE CITY)

Shops are essential!

The store includes off-price item, random lucky box, and general items!

The store is good! But don't buy on impulse! Watch out for bankruptcy! ~

The game currently has 3 main maps:

Mini map - FC Free City

Medium map - Aromatherapy Island

Large map - DonNoLa City

Each map is different in size, gameplay, strategy, and there are a variety of different map encounters waiting for everyone!

As a party game of Properties Management, the victory condition is: to set a "victory day" or "Bankrupt others"

But if you can get the favor of beautiful girls, of course, it is also very successful!

So, don't worry too much about victory conditions! ~

Support local play (up to 4 player) or play with Beautiful girl AI ~

Due to poverty and technical reasons, it is really not possible to do the network online programs, sorry ~

If you want to connect to the network, you can use Steam remote or online meeting software to play with your friends ~

There are the CV of love

Thanks to our strong cast of voice actors:

Q-Star

Yuuna Kyuuta - 由依结月

HuoHuo Okada

Iona Fujita 藤田伊緒奈

Yinzhu

Naoka Nakayama 中山尚華

Lace

Miyuki Nishimura 宫崎美雪

Lemon

Naoka Nakayama 中山尚華

Lin

Ayana Nagafuchi 永渕文菜

Little Karami

Haruna Suzuki 鈴木春菜

Chimera

Juliana Ayumi Misaki

三崎ジュリアナあゆみ

三崎朱莉安娜步

Maruli

Saho Taoka 田岡佐穂

Cyber Meow

Akina Kato 嘉藤明奈

Club maid Olissa

Mio Nakai 中井美桜

Announcer Kara

Asaka Yamazaki 山崎朝香

Sister Polly

Ayaka Oonishi 大西爱香

Engineer Wang Jiaxin

Miyuki Matsui 松井宫子

Store owner MOMOI ANAE

Touko Murakami 村上桃子

Fortune teller Lee Zhixi

Suzuka Hashino 桥野铃花

？？？

Soran Takei 武井宙舞

Saho Taoka 田岡佐穂

Finally

Parts of the game were designed with AI-assisted and then human rework and finish.

I hope you can support us and buy our legitimate games!

Refused! Refused! No pirated games! Your support is our motivation to continue to update! Love you! BiuBiuBiu~♥

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains subtle adult content:
swimsuits，Breast shaking
Exposed clothing, disguised nudity
The seductive posture of wearing clothes
Depictions of potential minors in sexually arousing poses, including where clothed
All the above content is in cartoon form
All characters are adults age

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7+
  • Processor: intel core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 1060+ OR AMD Radeon RX480+
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10+
  • Processor: intel core i7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060+ OR AMD 5600XT+
  • Storage: 13 GB available space

short_description: "Money & Lady" is a party game that requires luck & management strategy! (4K HD,5.6G free Hpatch)This is also the gentlemen's favorite game, the game won the New Earth Best Happiness Award and Not Tired to Replay Award! Support up to 4 players, and 7 different heroines is waiting for you...
